    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String url,
            int pages,
            java.util.Calendar publication,
            double value,
            int pagesRead,
            java.lang.String review,
            int copiesSold,
            int genre)
        Represents a book, which is a type of bibliographic product.
        pre: The id, name, url, pages, publication, value, pagesRead, review, copiesSold, and genre parameters are valid.
        post: A Book object is created with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier of the book.
        name - The name of the book.
        url - The URL of the book.
        pages - The number of pages in the book.
        publication - The publication date of the book.
        value - The value or price of the book.
        pagesRead - The number of pages already read in the book.
        review - The review of the book.
        copiesSold - The number of copies sold for the book.
        genre - The genre of the book (represented as an integer).

      • updateBook

        public void updateBook(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String url,
                       int pages,
                       java.util.Calendar publication,
                       double value,
                       int pagesRead,
                       java.lang.String review,
                       int copiesSold,
                       int genre)
        Updates the book's information with the specified parameters. If a parameter is set to a certain default value (-1 for integers, empty string for review), the corresponding attribute of the book object remains unchanged.
        pre:
        None.
        post:
        None.
        Parameters:
        name - the new name of the book.
        url - the new URL of the book.
        pages - the new number of pages in the book.
        publication - the new publication date of the book.
        value - the new value of the book.
        pagesRead - the new number of pages read in the book.
        review - the new review of the book.
        copiesSold - the new number of copies sold for the book.
        genre - the new genre of the book.

      • sellBP

        public void sellBP()
        Increases the number of copies sold for the book by one.
        pre:
        None.
        post:
        The number of copies sold for the book is increased by one.
        Specified by:
        sellBP in class BibliographicProduct
